argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlipdir.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | hlipdir.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | hlipdir.7 | |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hlph | |- ( U e. CHilOLD -> U e. CPreHilOLD ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_dipdir | |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) P C ) = ( ( A P C ) + ( B P C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) P C ) = ( ( A P C ) + ( B P C ) ) ) |
